summary: This is an email summary of a call regarding efforts to authenticate employment records, likely related to a witness or staff member. The discussion involves obtaining contact information for HR directors and scheduling preparation time, with a notable inquiry about the origin of certain records from a Mar-a-Lago contact.

persons.name: Pat P
persons.role: Contact providing information and coordinating authentication
persons.context: Sent contact information for HR directors, discussed a scanned spreadsheet record, and is coordinating with a Mar-a-Lago contact about the origin of records.

persons.name: Janine Gill
persons.context: Preceded other HR directors; may be able to authenticate the employment records in question.

connections.description: Pat P has contact information for HR directors who preceded Janine Gill and indicates Gill may be able to authenticate records, though they haven't spoken directly.
Pat P and her Mar-a-Lago contact are jointly inquiring about the origin of certain employment records.

events.title: Call regarding record authentication
events.description: A call took place to discuss obtaining HR contact information, authenticating a scanned spreadsheet of employment records, and scheduling preparation time in December.

keyFacts: A scanned spreadsheet of paper employment records is a key subject requiring authentication.
Janine Gill, a former HR director, is identified as a potential person who can authenticate the records.
Pat P and a Mar-a-Lago contact are seeking information about the origin of these employment records.
The document is subject to a protective order restricting certain paragraphs.
Preparation and scheduling for December are being coordinated, suggesting ongoing legal or investigative proceedings.
